row.pre_process:
!******************************** !EVNT.ROLLING_TRACE_START - Event tab !******************************** !Check Intervals of: X minutes !Check: Repeated !******************************** ! !EVNT.ROLLING_TRACE_START - Process tab ! !********************************
! ! Turn On ! !Set a TCP/IP=2 and DB=4 trace on the WPs !Get System Name :SET &TRC# = GET_UC_SYSTEM_NAME()
!Turn on tracing for WPs :SET_UC_SETTING SET_TRACE, &TRC#, "2400000000000000", "FILE"
!Set a TCP/IP=9 trace on the Agent - <Agent Name> needs to change to reflect actual agent !Turn on tracing :SET_UC_SETTING SET_TRACE, "<Agent Name>", "9000000000000000", "FILE"
